## Ingredients

Cheese (raclette is a type of cheese, purchase from a specialty shop if desired)
Meat: sausage
Vegetables: broccoli
Something sour: olives
(optional) carbs: potatoes

## Instructions

Melt the cheese in a raclette maker, pour over food once gooey. 

## Lisa's notes

The raclette maker was also able to fry an egg!
